ADESE.IS.summary: Adese Alisveris Merkezleri Ticaret A.S. primarily engages in the retail of fruits and vegetables in Turkey. The company also offers meat and bakery products. It operates a network of 140 stores. The company is also involved in the operation of shopping malls. Adese Alisveris Merkezleri Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AEBZY.long_name: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
AEBZY.summary: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, bottling, marketing, distribution, and sale of beer, malt, and non-alcoholic beverages. The company operates in three segments: Turkey Beer, International Beer, and Soft Drinks. It is also involved in the production, bottling, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages, fruit juice concentrates, purees and fresh fruit, and carbonated soft drinks under the Coca-Cola Company trademark; and filling and selling of natural spring water. In addition, the company provides market development services. It operates in Turkey, Russia, the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS), Europe, Central Asia, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AEFES.IS.long_name: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
AEFES.IS.summary: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, bottling, marketing, distribution, and sale of beer, malt, and non-alcoholic beverages. The company operates in three segments: Turkey Beer, International Beer, and Soft Drinks. It is also involved in the production, bottling, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages, fruit juice concentrates, purees and fresh fruit, and carbonated soft drinks under the Coca-Cola Company trademark; and filling and selling of natural spring water. In addition, the company provides market development services. It operates in Turkey, Russia, the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS), Europe, Central Asia, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AGHOL.IS.summary: AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the beer, soft drinks, automotive, retailing, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company produces and sells beer and malt, and carbonated and non-carbonated beverages, as well as passenger and commercial vehicles; imports, distributes, markets, and rents motor vehicles; and offers generators, and spares and component parts. It is also involved in the production of industrial engines; sale of tractors; production of writing instruments; distribution of other imported stationery products; arrangement of travelling and organization facilities; and provision of IT, internet, and e-commerce services. In addition, the company engages in the restaurant management; whole sale and retail sale of electricity; insurance agency; and production, distribution, and transmission of electricity businesses. Further, it purchases, sells, rents, and manages real estate properties; leases intellectual property; fills and sells natural spring water; and offers tourism services. The company was formerly known as Yazicilar Holding A.S. and changed its name to AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S. in December 2017. AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AVOD.IS.long_name: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim Ürünleri A.S.
AVOD.IS.summary: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim ÃrÃ¼nleri A.S. provides dried vegetables and derivatives, and vegetable based convenience foods under the Farmer`s Choice brand name in Turkey. Its products include sun dried tomatoes, oven semi dried tomatoes, sauces and bruschettas, fermented vegetables and grilled products, and grilled vegetables. The company serves hotels, restaurants, and the catering industry, as well as retail chains. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BANVT.IS.long_name: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
BANVT.IS.summary: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi produces, slaughters, and sells chicken and turkey meat products in Turkey. The company's chicken products include whole chicken, leg, breast, skewered, breaded, sauce, and other products; and turkey products comprise whole turkey, leg, breast, and other products. It also offers ready products consisting of burgers, meatballs, kebabs, coated products, and pastries; and delicatessen products, which include hams and salamis, frankfurters, and sausages. The company also exports its products to Azerbaijan, Macedonia, Kosovo, Northern Cyprus, Hong Kong, China, Georgia, Togo, Jordan, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and Benin. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Balikesir, Turkey. Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of TBQ Foods GmbH.

BIMAS.IS.summary: BIM Birlesik Magazalar A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates retail stores in Turkey, Morocco, and Egypt. Its stores sell approximately 750 items, including meat, breakfast and dairy, legumes and bakery, and personal care products, as well as beverages, snacks and sweets, fruits and vegetables, frozen foods, and cleaning supplies. As of March 05, 2020, the company operated 8,348 stores. BIM Birlesik Magazalar A.S. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

CASA.IS.long_name: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S.
CASA.IS.summary: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S. produces fish flour and fish oil in Turkey. It also engages in the buying and selling of real estate properties. Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

CCOLA.IS.summary: Coca-Cola IÃ§ecek Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in bottling and distributing alcohol-free beverages primarily in Turkey, Pakistan, Kazakhstan, Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Jordan, Iraq, Syria, and Tajikistan. The company is involved in the production, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages under the Coca-Cola, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Zero Sugar, Coca-Cola Light, Fanta, Sprite, Cappy, Sen Sun, Powerade, Monster, Burn, Gladiator, and Fuse tea brand names, as well as Schweppes and Dasani brand names. Its product portfolio also include juices, water, sports and energy drinks, tea, and iced tea. In addition, the company engages in the production and filling of natural spring water under the Damla name. Further, the company sells its products online. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Coca-Cola IÃ§ecek Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayi A.S.

CRFSA.IS.long_name: CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi A.S.
CRFSA.IS.summary: CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi A.S. engages in the retail business in Turkey. The company's stores offer fruits and vegetables, meat/deli/fish, milk and breakfast, food and cooking supplies, and drinks; cleaning and personal care products; electronic and white goods, and electrical appliances; house layout and housewares; stationeries; hardware and lighting products; batteries; garden, camping, and barbecue products; toys and entertainment products; auto and travel products; and spore products, such as exercise equipment, bicycle and accessories, sports balls, skateboarding and skating, darts, and pool and water sports products, as well as tennis, table tennis, and squash products. It sells its products through a network of 12,300 stores, as well as online. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. CarrefourSA Carrefour Sabanci Ticaret Merkezi A.S. is a subsidiary of Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S.

DARDL.IS.summary: Dardanel Ãnentas Gida Sanayi Anonim Sirketi provides canned fish products in Turkey. The company offers tuna, salmon, sardines, mackerel, anchovies, and other fish products, as well as sand mussels and frozen aquaculture products. It also produces fish flour and fish oil. In addition, the company provides ready meal products, including corn, bean, and grain tons. Dardanel Ãnentas Gida Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1984 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

EF41.SG.long_name: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
EF41.SG.summary: Anadolu Efes Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, bottling, marketing, distribution, and sale of beer, malt, and non-alcoholic beverages. The company operates in three segments: Turkey Beer, International Beer, and Soft Drinks. It is also involved in the production, bottling, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages, fruit juice concentrates, purees and fresh fruit, and carbonated soft drinks under the Coca-Cola Company trademark; and filling and selling of natural spring water. In addition, the company provides market development services. It operates in Turkey, Russia, the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS), Europe, Central Asia, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

EKIZ.IS.long_name: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
EKIZ.IS.summary: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the production and sale of olive oil products in Egypt. The company provides natural extra virgin, natural first, organic extra virgin, and refined olive oil, as well as Riviera olive oil. It offers its products under the Belluti, Dona Elena, Healthy You, and Kantarli brand names. The company was formerly known as Ekiz Yag ve Sabun Sanayii A.S. and changed its name to Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in September 2014. Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1946 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

ERSU.IS.long_name: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S.
ERSU.IS.summary: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells fruit concentrates and pulp juices in Turkey and internationally. The company offers clear products, including pear, quince, blackberry, apple, raspberry, sourcherry, pomegranate, black carrot, grape, carrot, and Ã§ilek juice concentrates; cloudy products, such as peach, apricot, and plum juice concentrates; and citrus fruit products consisting of orange, grapefruit, and lemon juice concentrates. It also provides puree products comprising pear, strawberry, apple, plum, fig, apricot, and peach puree; and tomato paste. In addition, the company offers pomegranate, apple, orange, black carrot, and grape juices; and fruit nectars, such as freemix, mixed fruit, apricot, orange, peach, and sour cherry nectars, as well as lemonade. The company distributes its products through a network of 9 regional directorates, as well as approximately 100 distributors. It serves retail sales points, as well as military facilities, hospital cafes, schools and sport complexes, catering, etc. Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

FADE.IS.long_name: Fade Gida Yatirim Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
FADE.IS.summary: Fade Gida Yatirim Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi operates in the food business. It provides salted/sulphured sun dried tomatoes. The company sells its organic products to its customers worldwide. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

FRIGO.IS.long_name: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
FRIGO.IS.summary: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carbonated and still drinks, fruit juices, and canned and frozen foods in Turkey. It offers apple, orange, peach, mango, apricot, pineapple, and lemon juices. The company also provides frozen fruits and vegetables; canned foods, such as citrus, plums, red kidney beans, sour and sweet cherries, and strawberries, as well as pepper products; and fruit and vegetable purees, including pastes and sauces. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

IZFAS.IS.long_name: Izmir Firça Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
IZFAS.IS.summary: Izmir FirÃ§a Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells various cleaning and painting brushes in Turkey and internationally. The company offers hand tools, brushes, rollers, mops, and squeegees for cleaning fields; and custom brushes for industries. It also provides construction products; and PET-PVC synthetic monofilaments fibers for brushes and brooms. The company is based in Izmir, Turkey.

IZTAR.IS.long_name: Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
IZTAR.IS.summary: Iz Hayvancilik Tarim ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces and sells milk in Turkey. It is also involved in the sale of holstein breed male animals and fertilizers; bio energy generation; production of feed for cattle; and production of fruits and saplings. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KENT.IS.long_name: Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
KENT.IS.summary: Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures candies and sugar lozenges in Turkey. It offers bubble gums, chewing gums, sugarless sweetener chewing gums, jellybeans, candies, chocolates, and biscuits under the Bubblicious, Falim, First, Jelibon, Olips, milka, oreo, Toblerone, Topitop, Missbo, Tofita, Tipitip, Susceptible, and city brands. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey. Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Cadbury Schweppes Overseas Limited

KERVT.IS.long_name: Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KERVT.IS.summary: Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and trades in frozen foods in Turkey. The company offers frozen and canned products, including bakery products, such as pizza, pastry, puff, pastry, Turkish ravioli, flatbread, and Turkish pizza; fruits and vegetables; meat products comprising meatballs, burgers, and chicken products; tuna fish and sweet corn; desserts, consisting of Knafeh, pistachio pastry, and mosaic cake; and seafood products, such as calamari and shrimps under the SuperFresh brand. It also provides margarine, pastry and catering, and industrial and edible oils under the Bizim Yag, Teremyag, Luna, Sabah, Yayla, Halk, Ona, Evet, Ustam, Akbis, Akao, Akrim, Arma, Mars, and SPY brand names. It is also involved in the generation of electricity; and production, trading, marketing, and export of agricultural and animal products. It offers its products through dealers and direct distribution channels, as well as exports its products to approximately 60 countries in Africa, Asia, Europe, South America, and North America. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

KNFRT.IS.long_name: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KNFRT.IS.summary: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable juice concentrates, fruit puree, and puree concentrates in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of DÃ¶hler Gida Sanayi A.S.

KRSTL.IS.long_name: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
KRSTL.IS.summary: Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces and sells soft drinks in Turkey and internationally. It offers carbonated, non-carbonated, and energy drinks; and mineral and spring water products. The company distributes and markets its products through distributor companies and dealers under the Kristal COLA, CHAT COLA, RED LINE, Kristal, and Balsa brand names. Kristal Kola ve Mesrubat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KRVGD.IS.long_name: Kervan Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KRVGD.IS.summary: Kervan Gida Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells candies in Turkey. It provides jellies, licorices, marshmallows, lollipops, gums, and functional products. The company was founded in 1994 is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MERKO.IS.long_name: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MERKO.IS.summary: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a processor and exporter of tomatoes into the raw material for the food industry worldwide. It processes tomatoes into tomato paste and diced tomato for industrial applications, as well as tomato juice concentrates. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

METRO.IS.long_name: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S.
METRO.IS.summary: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. operates in tourism, food, mining, and energy sectors. The company operates a fleet of buses under the METRO brand in Turkey and internationally; offers maintenance, repair, and spare parts for Metro buses; and operates 25 petrol stations and 59 stopover facilities. It is also involved in the breeding, rearing, caring, fattening, butchering, conservation, purchase, and sale of sheep, cattle, bovine, and poultry. In addition, the company engages in the gross or direct sale of electricity to consumers. Further, it extracts, processes, enriches, refines, buys, and rents its under and above ground ores and natural resources. Additionally, the company operates as a tour operator; engages in warehousing activities; and invests in a cake factory, paddy factory, fruit garden, and hotel. The company was formerly known as Van-Et A.S. Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. was founded in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MGROS.IS.summary: Migros Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail sale of food and beverages, and consumer and durable goods. Its stores offer various products, including cosmetics, stationery, glass and kitchenware, electronic appliances, books, textiles, and other items, as well as groceries and other necessities. As of April 22, 2020, it had a total of 2233 stores with 2131 Migros and 59 Macrocenter in 81 provinces in Turkey and 43 Ramstore stores internationally covering an area 2.514.425 square meters. The company also operates Migros Sanal Market, an online food retailing site, as well as an online shopping website. In addition, it rents floor space in the shopping malls to other trading companies. Migros Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

MTVMF.short_name: METRO TIC VE MA YATIRIM HLDG AN
MTVMF.long_name: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S.
MTVMF.summary: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. operates in tourism, food, mining, and energy sectors. The company operates a fleet of buses under the METRO brand in Turkey and internationally; offers maintenance, repair, and spare parts for Metro buses; and operates 25 petrol stations and 59 stopover facilities. It is also involved in the breeding, rearing, caring, fattening, butchering, conservation, purchase, and sale of sheep, cattle, bovine, and poultry. In addition, the company engages in the gross or direct sale of electricity to consumers. Further, it extracts, processes, enriches, refines, buys, and rents its under and above ground ores and natural resources. Additionally, the company operates as a tour operator; engages in warehousing activities; and invests in a cake factory, paddy factory, fruit garden, and hotel. The company was formerly known as Van-Et A.S. Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. was founded in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

OYLUM.IS.summary: Oylum Sinai Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi provides plain and creamy biscuits, waffles, crackers, chocolate waffles, and chocolate bars. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

PENGD.IS.summary: Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable products in Turkey. The company's products include jam, preserved vegetables, ready meals, preserved boiled legumes, tomato and pepper pastes, pickles, delicatessen, sauces and spreads, preserves, and frozen food products. It offers its products to national and local market chains, and middle-sized retailers, as well as mass consumption channels, such as hotels, restaurants, and cafeterias. The company exports its products to 35 countries, including Germany, the United States, France, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Russia, and Sweden. Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

PETUN.IS.long_name: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S.
PETUN.IS.summary: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. produces and sells meat and by-products of cattle, sheep, poultry, and fish under the Pinar brand in Turkey. It offers delicatessen products, including soudjouks, salamis, sausages, hams, smoked meats, roasted meat products, and pastramis; frozen meat products, such as burgers, meatballs, doners, and breaded meat products; and frozen dough products comprising pizzas, puff pastries, mantis, boreks, and boyoz products. The company also provides frozen seafood products consisting of shrimps, sliced squids, and breaded seafood products, as well as anchovy, sardine, and haddock products; and unprocessed meat products, such as unprocessed turkey, beef, and lamb products. It serves hotels, restaurants, catering companies, and schools. The company also exports its products. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

PINSU.IS.long_name: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PINSU.IS.summary: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells bottled water, pet bottle, carbonated and noncarbonated beverage, and fruit beverage under the Pinar Yasam Pinarim brand name in Turkey. It also exports its products to United Kingdom, Germany, the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, Iraq, Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Romania, Ireland, Libya, Singapore, Malta, Kosovo, Trinidad Tobago, Switzerland, the United States, Ukraine, and Belgium. The company was formerly known as Pinar Su Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in April 2019. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

PNSUT.IS.summary: Pinar SÃ¼t Mamulleri Sanayii A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the processing, production, and sale of milk and dairy products in Turkey. It offers milk, butter, cheese, yoghurts, kefir, ayrans, creams, fruit juices and drinks, flavors, desserts, delicatessens, convenience foods, sea foods, bottled water, out-of-home consumption products, sauces, jam and honey, pudding, and powdered products under the Pinar brand name. The company also exports its products to 27 countries, including Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Qatar, Iraq, TRNC, Azerbaijan, Russia, Brazil, the People's Republic of China, the United States, and other countries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar SÃ¼t MamÃ¼lleri Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

SANFM.IS.long_name: Sanifoam Sünger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANFM.IS.summary: Sanifoam SÃ¼nger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides insulation and cleaning products. It offers firex, polyester felt, melamine sponge, bondex, and flame retardant polyurethane sponge insulation products. The company also provides cleaning products, such as scrubber sponges, scouring balls and fibers, cleaning cloths, and bath and other sponges; detergents and personal care products; and raw-materials and semi-finished products. Its products are used in automotive, household appliance, sound insulation and acoustic arrangement, industrial insulation, and technical applications. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SELGD.IS.long_name: Selçuk Gida Endüstri Ihracat Ithalat A.S.
SELGD.IS.summary: SelÃ§uk Gida EndÃ¼stri Ihracat Ithalat A.S. produces and sells dried fruits in Turkey. It offers dried figs, apricots, sourcherries, and tomatoes; and pine kernels and sultanas under the EAGLE brand and various private labels through hyper-supermarkets and discount chains. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries, including Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, Switzerland, Austria, Greece, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Norway, the United States, Australia, Argentina, Canada, Israel, China, Japan, and South Korea. SelÃ§uk Gida EndÃ¼stri Ihracat Ithalat A.S. was founded in 1932 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

TACTR.IS.long_name: Taç Tarim Ürünleri Hayvancilik Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
TACTR.IS.summary: TaÃ§ Tarim ÃrÃ¼nleri Hayvancilik Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in dairy cattle breeding, fattening, rooster chicken, and greenhouse activities in Turkey. It sells milk and chicken; and engages in the irrigated farming. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in DÃ¼zce, Turkey.

TATGD.IS.summary: Tat Gida Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, marketing, trade, and brokerage of semi-finished and finished goods in Turkey and internationally. The company operates through Tomato Paste and Canned Foods, and Milk and Dairy Products segments. It offers dairy milk products consisting of pasteurized milk, UHT milk, protein milk, dairy drinks, yogurt and yogurt drinks, probiotic drinks, quark, quark muesli bar, cream, cheese, butter, fruit juices, and breakfast foods under the SEK brand name. The company also provides canned foods, such as tomato paste, vegetables products, tomato products, ready foods, pickles, delicatessen, organic products, boiled products, and jam; and sauces, such as ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard, and condiment sauces under the TAT brand name. The company was formerly known as Tat Konserve Sanayii AS. and changed its name to Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. in November 2013. Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TBORG.IS.long_name: Türk Tuborg Bira ve Malt Sanayii A.S.
TBORG.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk Tuborg Bira ve Malt Sanayii A.S. engages in the production, marketing, sale, and distribution of beer and malt in Turkey and internationally. The company offers its products under the Tuborg, Carlsberg, SKOL, FREDERIK, Venus, and Troy brands, as well as imports SOL, Weihenstephan, GUINNESS, Kronenbourg 1664 Blanc, KILKENNY, Grimbergen, and DESPERADOS branded products. It also provides soft drinks. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries, such as England, Canada, Germany, Iraq, and the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. TÃ¼rk Tuborg Bira ve Malt Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of International Beer Breweries Ltd.

TKURU.IS.long_name: Taze Kuru Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
TKURU.IS.summary: Taze Kuru Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates in the food industry in Turkey. It offers fruits, vegetables, teas, snacks, soups, chocolates and powders, and campaigns, as well as gifts. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.

TUKAS.IS.long_name: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
TUKAS.IS.summary: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells food products. The company offers tomato products, including grated tomatoes and pastes; canned products comprising vegetables, delicatessen, pulses, corns, and ready meals; pickles; pickled and roasted vegetables; jams; sauces, such as ketchups, mayonnaises, hot pepper sauces, and breakfast sauces; olives; and frozen, catering, and garnishing products. It sells its products under the Tukas brand name. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

ULKER.IS.summary: Ãlker BiskÃ¼vi Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, marketing, and sale of chocolates, chocolate-coated biscuits, biscuits, cakes, wafers, and crackers in Turkey. It is also involved in the trading and investment activities. It offers its products under the various company owned brands, as well as private labels. The company exports its products to the Middle East, Russia, and Central Asian republics, as well as to Europe, Africa, and the United States. Ãlker BiskÃ¼vi Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ãlker BiskÃ¼vi Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of pladis Foods Limited.

ULUUN.IS.long_name: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ULUUN.IS.summary: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells flour in Turkey. It offers chapati, biscuit, bread, noodle, and soft noodle flour products; and products for high gluten aqua feed and aqua feed, as well as home use products. The company exports its wheat flour to 72 countries in 5 continents from Far East to the Caribbean Islands covering Africa and the Middle East countries. Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Samsun, Turkey.

VANGD.IS.long_name: Vanet Gida Sanayi Iç Ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
VANGD.IS.summary: Vanet Gida Sanayi IÃ§ Ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the production and selling of various meat products in Turkey. It offers sausage, salami, fried meat, ham, and dried meat products. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VKING.IS.summary: Viking Kagit ve SelÃ¼loz A.S. produces and sells papers for the cleaning paper industry in Turkey. The company offers toilet papers, paper towels, napkins, facial tissues, wet towels, dispensers, and other products under the Premia, Lily, Senso, Select, and Pufla brands. It also exports its products to 23 countries, primarily to the Europe and Central Asian Republics. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Viking Kagit ve SelÃ¼loz A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

YAPRK.IS.summary: Yaprak SÃ¼t ve Besi Ãiftlikleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in animal husbandry business in Turkey. The company breeds calf, heifers, and dairy animals. It also operates milk production facilities. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
